price: Abazorahira ko batazorangura amabanga y’abubatse n’abakenyezi babo mu buzima bwabo bwose canke mu kiringo kirenga amezi ane, bafise ikiringo c’amezi ane co kwisubirako, nibisubirako ku ndahiro imbere yuko amezi ane arangira, mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah Izobababarira, ni Nyenikigongwe-ntangere, Nyenimbabazi ku batoni bayo.
arabic: لِّلَّذِينَ يُؤۡلُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمۡ تَرَبُّصُ أَرۡبَعَةِ أَشۡهُرٖۖ فَإِن فَآءُو فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna yu'lūna min nisāihim tarabbuṣu arbaʿati ashhurin fa-in fāū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
